snippet.title: E3 1996 Aeon Flux game trailer presentation (canceled PS1 game)
snippet.description:
This came from an E3 1996 tape, I'll link it when I find it. I love Aeon Flux and this game fascinates me, the developers lost the license and it was released in PAL region only as Pax Corpus, stripped of all Aeon Flux elements but you can really tell in the released game what the bones are. 

There's a build of the Aeon Flux version of the game that's online, which is cool. This trailer shows some bits of FMV cutscenes from the game, which aren't included in the build. Would be cool to see those or any other builds of this game someday. Or the other canceled Aeon Flux game from The Collective from a few years later.
